creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: multicolored embroidered skirt; skirt made up of different panel sections; largest panel consists of green, brown, yellow, and tan geometric embroidered design; second largest section consists of long snake like embroidered animal motif; horizontal multicolored strips decorate bottom and section in between two embroidered sections
title: Skirt
